---
title: "Cleaning"
output: html_document
date: "2025-11-02"
---

```{r}
# Pakiety
library(tidyverse)   # w tym dplyr, stringr, readr, tibble
library(janitor)

# Wczytanie (podmień ścieżkę)
df <- readr::read_csv("data/raw/world_tourism_economic_data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

# Ujednolicenie kolumn country i year
df1 <- df %>%
  mutate(
    country = stringr::str_trim(country),
    year    = as.integer(year)
  )

# Słownik zmiennych (przykład)
var_dict <- tibble::tibble(
  variable = c("country","year","arrivals","tourism_receipts_usd",
               "gdp_per_capita_usd","services_share_pct","unemployment_pct"),
  description = c("Kraj","Rok","Liczba przyjazdów turystycznych",
                  "Przychody z turystyki [USD]","PKB per capita [USD]",
                  "Udział usług w PKB [%]","Stopa bezrobocia [%]")
)


```
